channel.title: How do I make NPC's move?

item.title: How do I make NPC's move?
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:5, topic:236345”]It’s so much easier with MySQL[/quote]Lol, moparscapers won’t even be able to get mysql working, and you think they can convert cfg files to tables in a database? Lol.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make NPC's move?

item.title: How do I make NPC's move?
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“si force, post:9, topic:236345”][quote author=kick my sim link=topic=311880.msg2486198#msg2486198 date=1223849747]

Same thing lol kinda its easy to figure out…[quote author=xstrxpurez link=topic=311880.msg2486145#msg2486145 date=1223847728]

do autospawn.cfg

Right. Thanks.
and do like this

spawn = 1 3222 3224 0 3223 3225 3221 3223 1 Lumby man

thats a man in lumby that moves

wrong. u need to edit the range on them such as…

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-HP-Descrption spawn = 945 3095 3110 0 #### #### #### #### 1 RSGUIDE
now where the ####'s are are the ranges… which in any easy way you can do it like this
x1- will make it so its in the upper corner for like the north west or north east side for him to walk to Y1 is the other upper corner and then x2 is the corner below the x1 and y2 is the corner below the y1… what that does is set up a box allowing them to move around in… but they cant leave it unless they are attacking you.

coordx–coordy–hight–coordx+1–coordy+1–coordx-1–coordy-1–walktype description…
its eiser that way

[/quote]
[/quote]

spamPostCount++;

If you know what that means, You’ll realize and stop,
Its a java term, And you just added to it.[/quote]

I think he did type something. ^
Hard to see tho.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make NPC's move?

item.title: How do I make NPC's move?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“kick my sim, post:8, topic:236345”][quote author=mathew000000000 link=topic=311880.msg2486149#msg2486149 date=1223847916]
Same thing lol kinda its easy to figure out…[quote author=xstrxpurez link=topic=311880.msg2486145#msg2486145 date=1223847728]

do autospawn.cfg

Right. Thanks.
and do like this

spawn = 1 3222 3224 0 3223 3225 3221 3223 1 Lumby man

thats a man in lumby that moves

wrong. u need to edit the range on them such as…

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-HP-Descrption spawn = 945 3095 3110 0 #### #### #### #### 1 RSGUIDE
now where the ####'s are are the ranges… which in any easy way you can do it like this
x1- will make it so its in the upper corner for like the north west or north east side for him to walk to Y1 is the other upper corner and then x2 is the corner below the x1 and y2 is the corner below the y1… what that does is set up a box allowing them to move around in… but they cant leave it unless they are attacking you.
[/quote]

coordx–coordy–hight–coordx+1–coordy+1–coordx-1–coordy-1–walktype description…
its eiser that way

[/quote][/quote]

spamPostCount++;

If you know what that means, You’ll realize and stop,
Its a java term, And you just added to it.

Read full topic

Right. Thanks.
and do like this

thats a man in lumby that moves

wrong. u need to edit the range on them such as…

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-HP-Descrption spawn = 945 3095 3110 0 #### #### #### #### 1 RSGUIDE
now where the ####'s are are the ranges… which in any easy way you can do it like this
x1- will make it so its in the upper corner for like the north west or north east side for him to walk to Y1 is the other upper corner and then x2 is the corner below the x1 and y2 is the corner below the y1… what that does is set up a box allowing them to move around in… but they cant leave it unless they are attacking you.
[/quote]

coordx–coordy–hight–coordx+1–coordy+1–coordx-1–coordy-1–walktype description…
its eiser that way[/quote]

now where the ####'s are are the ranges… which in any easy way you can do it like this
